data.message:
My family needs hep
We did a go fund me page cause my family is in desperate need of help. I don't know where is to go or try to get the page out so everyone can see it. 
My husband had a very bad injury while he was at work. He had an air gun hit him in the eye. Now he can't see out of his left eye. He was the soul provider of the family and the only one who drove. And now he can work hasn't been at work since it happen which was almost two weeks ago. And may not be able to go back. We are falling behind on bills rent etc. so I'm asking for people to please share the page
You can go to my page and share it
Margie Pettit green. 
Thank you.
